# OSS RL Aug-Sep 2017 analysis on D36

```{r adjust_directory_if_needed, include=FALSE}
# Initialise Project

```

```{r load_project, include=FALSE}
# 1. Set options in config/global.dcf
# 2. Load packages listed in config/global.dcf
# 3. Import functions and coe in lib directory
# 4. Load data in data directory
# 5. Run data manipulations in munge directory 

rm(list = ls()) # optionally refresh workspace
library(ProjectTemplate); load.project()
rl_os <- subset(rl_os, month %in% c('y201708', 'y201709'))
```

```{r obs_month_table, echo=FALSE}
t <- table(rl_os$result, rl_os$month)
print(t)
prop.table(t, 2)*100
```

Test of independent month, result
```{r chiq_test_independent, echo=FALSE}
i <- chisq.test(t)
i_p <- i$p.value
if (i_p <= 0.05) {
    cat('month and result are dependent')
} else {
    cat('monht and result are independent')
}
```
